title: Samsung, SK hynix to supply chips to OpenAI
description: South Korea's top two semiconductor manufacturers Samsung Electronics Co. and SK hynix Inc. will supply OpenAI Inc., the world's largest artificial intelligence (AI) company, with up to 900,000 wafers of DRAM per month by 2029, according to a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business Newspaper Korea.

title: Global Chipmakers Add $200 Billion In Record Rally On AI Frenzy
description: Global chipmakers saw their market value soar as investors rushed to get exposure to artificial intelligence, the latest sign of a frenetic bull run that is pushing tech stocks to all-time highs.

title: AI frenzy sends S.Korea, Taiwan stocks to record highs
description: EMERGING Asian stock markets rallied to multi-year highs on Thursday, with South Korea and Taiwan notching record peaks, as a fresh wave of artificial intelligence-fuelled optimism boosted risk appetite.
content:

title: Tech Drives Stock Rally as OpenAI Fuels Optimism: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- Technology stocks drove global indexes to fresh highs after a share deal catapulted OpenAI to the world’s most valuable startup, bolstering optimism for artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Korean Air partners with Anduril to co
description: Korean Air Lines Co. on Wednesday said it will work with U.S. defense unicorn Anduril Industries Inc. to develop an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered wildfire response system using drones, according to a report by Pulse, the English service of Maeil Business Newspaper Korea.
content: Seoul [South Korea], October 2 (ANI): Korean Air Lines Co. has said it will work with U.S. defence unicorn Anduril Industries Inc. to develop an artificial intelligence (AI)-powered wildfire response system using drones, according to a report by Puls... [2209 chars]

title: Revolutionizing Creativity: The Impact of AI on Textual and Visual Literacy
description: Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) is transforming how we create and interpret text and images. This shift necessitates new literacies that blend textual and visual skills, allowing individuals to critically assess AI-generated content. Understanding AI's impact is essential for effective communication in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.
content: Generative Artificial Intelligence (AI) is significantly altering the landscape of creativity, reshaping the ways we create and interpret both text and images. Traditionally, visual and textual literacy have been cornerstones of communication, but th... [756 chars]

title: Veteran Actor June Squibb on AI's Uncanny Film Presence
description: June Squibb, a veteran actor, discusses the inevitable presence of artificial intelligence in filmmaking, highlighting the ongoing debate over its advantages and disadvantages, particularly its impact on human jobs. Squibb reflects on personal experiences with AI's voice replication challenges, calling the technology 'frightening' yet undeniable.
content: Veteran actor June Squibb has weighed in on the growing use of artificial intelligence in filmmaking, saying audiences can recognize its presence on screen. Despite its rapid emergence, Squibb urges acceptance and adaptation to this inevitable techno... [585 chars]

title: AI in classrooms: Will Indian schools bridge the digital divide?
description: As artificial intelligence reshapes learning globally, the traditional classroom model is under scrutiny. In India, gaps in digital infrastructure and teacher preparedness raise questions about how ready schools are for an AI-driven future. With only half of schools equipped with computers and internet, the challenge is both vast and urgent.
content: Some global scholars now predict that the traditional idea of a classroom could look very different by mid-century, with artificial intelligence (AI) reshaping who learns what, when and how. At a recent forum at Harvard Graduate School of Education, ... [8320 chars]
